If you are exporting from a major
 port for the first time, it is necessary
 to undergo Port KYC, which is a
 compulsory procedure. Failure to
comply with this requirement mayb
result in difficulties with clearance.

Once you opt for this service, you will receive mail from us. You are suppose to reply it with the Invoice. Final Proposal will be shared over mail after you provide us with the invoice.

If you are exporting from a major port for the first time, it is necessary to undergo Port KYC, which is a compulsory procedure. Failure to comply with this requirement may result in difficulties with clearance.
If you\'re unable to claim your insurance for your perishable shipments, our legal team is here to \nhelp ensure that you receive the coverage you \ndeserve

Recoupex GmbH is an on-demand, global cargo
transportation lawyers' hub with HQ in Hamburg.
The company helps fresh produce exporters and 
freight forwarders to obtain compensation from
the liabe carrier when cargo is lost or damaged in
transit under no win - no pay structure.

You can schedule a free consultation to check if you are qualify for a claim. After you decide to proceed with legal assistance, you will be required to pay a service fee equal to 20% of the settlement amount once your claim has been settled.
